bio.heading: Hi, I'm Jeffrey Boisvert
bio.subheading: I'm a Software Developer from Qu√©bec with a love for problem solving, learning, and data.
bio.firstParagraphPartOne: Since I could remember I have always loved working with software (from making games on Scratch to building my own websites). This started me down the path of wanting to become a developer and I have not stopped since.
bio.firstParagraphHighlightedText: I believe software can be used to solve many problems
bio.firstParagraphPartTwo: and I love building those solutions.
bio.secondParagraph: I have experience with several programing languages such as Python, Javascript, C#, Jave, PHP, and Kotlin (I love tinkering with Ardunios too). I have worked with several web frameworks such as Laravel, Django, Flask, Lumen and Express. I am also the first to dive into new technology and love intergrating with cloud services.
bio.thirdParagraphPartOne: When I'm not coding, you'll find me hiking, playing music, or simply exploring new places. Whatever I decide to do I always love having a nice cup of coffee
bio.forthParagraphPartThree: I have built, or reach out to me to help you with your project.
